bibl.title: Coin Dies in the Greco-Roman Museum of Alexandria.
Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud
bibl.author: TADROS, Edward Kamel

bibl.note: 9 coin dies. Provenances unknown, Ptolemaic and Roman periods.
TADROS Edward Kamel, Coin Dies in the Greco-Roman Museum of Alexandria.
Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud = BSAA 45 (1993) pp. 379-382, pl. XCV.
